name: UniVerso
description:
Universo (Metaverso) Corporativo is an innovative platform that allows companies and organizations to create and collaborate on projects in a virtual way, using virtual reality technology. With Universo (Metaverso) Corporativo, it is possible to rent virtual spaces for projects and relocate them whenever desired, offering flexibility and agility to carry out work.

Our platform also offers the possibility of collaborating with other companies and organizations, enabling the creation of innovative and high-impact projects.

If you are a company interested in using the Corporate Metaverse Universe for your projects, contact us for more information and to find out how to participate.

Metaverso 100% Focused on the Business world, come and do business in the biggest Brazilian metabusiness.

Lands in the UniVerse
We offer complete real estate development services for your virtual real estate properties. No matter what type of business you want to build in the metaverses, we can provide end-to-end development, allowing you to free up your time while we take care of all the details.
